bibl.title: Musical Notes on the New Anonymous Lyric Poem from Köln.
bibl.note: P. Colon. Inv. 21351 + 21376, col. ii, 9-21 [edd.: Michael GRONEWALD und Robert W. DANIEL, Lyrischer Text (Sappho-Papyrus), ZPE 154 (2005) pp. 7-12, 1 fig.]. - Dicolon and dialogue. - The addressee: Eros or Hermes? - Music and Musical Myth. - Conclusion. - Epilogue: the nature of the papyrus.
RAWLES Richard, Musical Notes on the New Anonymous Lyric Poem from Köln.
